name: audio-device
title: Set Audio Device
description: Switch the active audio device of your mac.
author: benvp

commands.name: set-output-device
commands.title: Set Output Device
commands.subtitle: Audio Device
commands.description: Sets the active audio output device.

commands.name: set-input-device
commands.title: Set Input Device
commands.subtitle: Audio Device
commands.description: Sets the active audio input device.

commands.name: favourite
commands.title: Set Output Device to Favourite
commands.subtitle: Audio Device
commands.description: Sets the active audio output device to the favourite specified in the preferences

commands.name: toggle-favourites
commands.title: Toggle Favourites
commands.subtitle: Audio Device
commands.description: Toggle the active audio output device between the favourites specified in the preferences

preferences.name: airplay
preferences.title: Enable AirPlay Support
preferences.description: Enable AirPlay speakers detection on the output devices list.
preferences.label: Include AirPlay devices

preferences.name: systemOutput
preferences.title: Play sound effects through current output
preferences.description: Play system sounds through current output.
preferences.label: Update system sounds output

preferences.name: favourite
preferences.title: Favourite Output Device
preferences.description: The name, as found in the output device list, of the output device to use as the first favourite

preferences.name: favourite2
preferences.title: Favourite Output Device 2
preferences.description: The name, as found in the output device list, of the output device to use as the second favourite

scripts.build: npm run copy-binary && ray build -e dist
